10+ years of industry experience in project management

input.job_description:
## Job Title: Senior Electrical Project Manager

### Company: [Bright Sparks Engineering Solutions]

### Location: Karachi, Pakistan

**Job Overview:**
Join [Bright Sparks Engineering Solutions] as a Senior Electrical Project Manager to lead our dynamic engineering team. You will oversee complex electrical projects from inception to completion, ensuring adherence to design, quality planning, and installation standards. Your role is crucial in fostering an innovative and collaborative work environment, driving projects to success with strategic direction and optimal resource allocation.

### Key Responsibilities
- Lead the engineering department in achieving strategic business goals.
- Coordinate all elements of electrical projects, including design and quality assurance.
- Manage project budgets, resource allocation, and timelines effectively.
- Provide mentorship and guidance to engineering teams.
- Facilitate excellent communication between stakeholders, vendors, and clients.

### Key Skills
- Strong business acumen and strategic thinking.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- Extensive experience in team management and project leadership.

### Desired Expertise
- Electrical Design Evaluation (FEED)
- Project Management (including FAT/SAT execution)
- Equipment Procurement and Vendor Management
- Installation, Testing & Commissioning of electrical systems

### Education
- Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field.
- Master’s degree in Management or Project Management preferred.

### Experience
- 10+ years in electrical project management or a related field.

### What We Offer
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunity to work on high-profile international projects.
- A stimulating environment that encourages professional growth and development.
minimum_requirements: Proficiency in electrical design and project execution
10+ years of industry experience in project management

management is preferable.
